title: Robotic Skull
summaries: The Robotic Skull is a Hardmode pet-summoning item that spawns Mini Prime, a miniature version of Skeletron Prime that follows the player around. The Robotic Skull has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by Skeletron Prime in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a miniature Skeletron Prime
'We can rebuild it.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
